channel.title: How do I make my auto cache webclient show the progress?
channel.description:
How do I make my auto cache webclient show the progress? As in show a percent or a loading bar thing.
I have a webclient that loads the cache fine, but when it loads it looks like it freezes for a few mins then its done, My users think the game just freezes all the time, So I really need to know how to do this. Thanks a lot for who ever helps.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2007, 04:34:20 PM[/size][hr]Nobody knows?
